entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Placentia

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
